events.message: I received the wrong size of the jacket I ordered and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified as a refund request due to incorrect product size delivered to the customer.
This case has been assigned to our refund specialist team member to handle the refund process promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the incorrect size you received. I’m here to help get this sorted out for you.
Could you please provide photos of the jacket and the packing slip that came with your delivery? This will help us process your refund.
I have attached the photos of the jacket showing the label and the packing slip from the package as requested.
Thank you for the photos. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions on the refund process.
The refund process has been completed on our end, and you should see the amount credited to your account shortly.
We’re checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As your refund has been successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you!
